decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to control the board through counter spells and removal while generating value through card draw and mana ramp. It aims to stall the game with Wilderness Reclamation and then win through powerful late game threats like Shark Typhoon and Uro. The deck also utilizes versatile cards like Expansion / Explosion for flexibility in different situations. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to outvalue the opponent through efficient control and resource management.

This deck focuses on controlling the board using powerful enchantments and planeswalkers to slow down the opponent's strategy. By utilizing Fires of Invention, the player can cast multiple spells each turn without spending mana, allowing them to bring out big threats like Agent of Treachery or Shark Typhoon. The deck also includes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion for additional value and card advantage. Overall, the key strategy revolves around managing resources efficiently and outlasting the opponent through incremental advantage.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through the use of counterspells, removal, and card draw. It aims to ramp up mana quickly with Wilderness Reclamation and Growth Spiral to cast big spells like Shark Typhoon and Expansion / Explosion. The deck also utilizes Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath for card advantage and life gain. The key strategy is to outvalue the opponent by controlling the board and resources while setting up for a powerful finish with large threats or a massive Explosion.

The deck focuses on using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It also aims to generate additional value through blinking permanents with Yorion, Sky Nomad, and creating a board presence with tokens. With a mix of control elements, card advantage engines, and a versatile win condition in Shark Typhoon, the deck aims to grind out the opponent and outlast them in a longer game while maintaining a strong defensive position.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing the Fires of Invention enchantment to cast powerful spells for free. The aim is to establish board control through cards like Shark Typhoon and Agent of Treachery while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Narset, Parter of Veils. The deck also includes cards like Omen of the Sun and Shatter the Sky for removal and protection, ensuring that the player can outvalue and outlast their opponent in a longer game.

The main focus of this Jund Control deck is to use various sacrifice and recursion effects to control the board and generate value. By utilizing cards like Trail of Crumbs, Claim the Firstborn, and Witch's Oven, the deck aims to outvalue opponents through card advantage and creature manipulation. Additionally, the Mayhem Devil and Priest of Forgotten Gods provide additional ways to control the board and chip away at opponents' life totals. The inclusion of Bolas's Citadel offers the deck an alternative win condition and further card advantage.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize the synergy between sacrificing creatures and dealing direct damage to the opponent, while maximizing the odd converted mana cost cards to benefit from Obosh, the Preypiercer's ability. This aggressive Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Serrated Scorpion to trigger effects like Mayhem Devil's pings and Witch's Oven's food tokens. The inclusion of cards like Claim the Firstborn and Murderous Rider allow for disruption and removal, while also maintaining a steady pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent quickly and efficiently. By utilizing cards like Skewer the Critics, Shock, and Bedevil, it aims to control the board while steadily chipping away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Obosh, the Preypiercer and Judith, the Scourge Diva further enhances the deck's ability to deal extra damage with each creature and spell. Overall, the deck's game plan revolves around applying early pressure and overwhelming the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and spells. It utilizes cards that provide value when they enter the battlefield, such as Winota, Joiner of Forces and Agent of Treachery, to keep the pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Tamiyo, Collector of Tales and Neoform to help dig for key pieces and maintain card advantage. By efficiently curving out creatures and utilizing powerful spells, this deck aims to secure victory through relentless aggression and strategic play.

The main idea of this deck is to aggressively cycle through cards to quickly build up a board presence and deal damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Boon of the Wish-Giver and Memory Leak for card draw, along with cycling cards like Flourishing Fox and Drannith Stinger, the deck aims to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy. Zenith Flare serves as a finisher, dealing damage based on the number of cards cycled that game. The deck also includes some creature cards like Valiant Rescuer and Drannith Healer for additional support.

The deck focuses on using flying creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently while also providing some disruption with cards like Thief of Sanity and Rankle, Master of Pranks. Yorion, Sky Nomad serves as a companion to provide additional value by flickering your creatures. The deck includes cards like Empyrean Eagle and Skycat Sovereign to pump up your flyers, allowing you to close out games quickly. Overall, the goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and control the board with a mix of aggressive threats and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the board with a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers. By utilizing Fires of Invention, the deck can cast powerful spells for free while still having mana open for interaction. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional card advantage and value by flickering permanents for extra ETB effects. The deck aims to control the game until it can establish a dominant board presence with cards like Agent of Treachery and Shark Typhoon to close out the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through sacrificing creatures and generating value from their deaths. By using cards like Witch's Oven, Mayhem Devil, and Priest of Forgotten Gods, the deck can chip away at the opponent's resources while generating advantages for itself. The inclusion of Trail of Crumbs helps with card advantage and consistency. The deck also has a strong late-game threat in Korvold, Fae-Cursed King, which can become a powerful finisher if left unchecked. Overall, the strategy revolves around grinding out incremental advantages and overwhelming the opponent with value.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and counterspells, utilizing evasion and tempo advantage with cards like Sea-Dasher Octopus and Brazen Borrower. The deck aims to control the board with counterspells like Sinister Sabotage and Quench, while also generating card advantage with cards like Spectral Sailor. The inclusion of Castle Vantress provides additional late-game power, while Ashiok's Erasure offers removal and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and apply pressure while maintaining control of the game.
